content: The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

content: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

content: You learn more from failure than from success.
author: Unknown

content: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

content: If you are working on something exciting, it will keep you motivated.
author: Unknown

content: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
author: Bo Bennett

content: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
author: Unknown

content: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
author: Unknown

content: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

content: Everything you can imagine is real.
author: Pablo Picasso

content: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
author: Unknown

content: Little things make big days.
author: Unknown

content: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

content: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

content: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
author: Chris Grosser

content: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.
author: Albert Einstein

content: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

content: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

content: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

content: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
author: Unknown

content: Great things never come from comfort zones.
author: Unknown

content: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Unknown

content: Success doesn't just find you. You have to go out and get it.
author: Unknown

content: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

content: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
author: Thomas Jefferson

content: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
author: Unknown

content: Sometimes later becomes never. Do it now.
author: Unknown

content: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

content: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference.
author: Roy T. Bennett

content: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

content: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

content: You are never too old to set another goal or dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

content: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
author: Roy T. Bennett

content: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

content: Work hard in silence, let success make the noise.
author: Frank Ocean

content: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

content: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: Charles Kingsleigh

content: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

content: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

content: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

content: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
author: Albert Schweitzer

content: Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
author: Unknown

content: Sometimes we’re tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
author: Unknown

content: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

content: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
author: Unknown

content: The future depends on what you do today.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

content: Success is what comes after you stop making excuses.
author: Unknown

content: Believe in yourself and all that you are.
author: Christian D. Larson

content: Do what you can with all you have, wherever you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

content: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

content: Difficulties in life don’t come to destroy you. They come to help you realize your potential.
author: Unknown

content: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

content: Your time is limited, don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

content: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

content: The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
author: George Washington

content: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

content: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

content: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill

content: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

content: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

content: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

content: Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn

content: Don’t let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

content: Try to be a rainbow in someone’s cloud.
author: Maya Angelou

content: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

content: Hustle in silence and let your success make the noise.
author: Unknown

content: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

content: Keep going. Be all in.
author: Bryan Hutchinson

content: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

content: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
author: Helen Hayes

content: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
author: Karen Lamb

content: Don’t be afraid to start over. It’s a chance to rebuild what you want.
author: Unknown

content: Be not afraid of life. Believe that life is worth living.
author: William James

content: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.
author: Joseph Chilton Pearce

content: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
author: George S. Patton

content: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

content: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
author: Tim Notke

content: Do what you love, love what you do.
author: Unknown

content: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
author: Unknown

content: Sometimes we’re tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
author: Unknown

content: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
author: Jim Rohn

content: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
author: Unknown

content: Small steps every day lead to big results.
author: Unknown

content: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

content: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

content: It always seems impossible until it is done.
author: Nelson Mandela

content: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

content: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

content: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

content: Don't be busy, be productive.
author: Unknown

content: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

content: Your passion is waiting for your courage to catch up.
author: Isabelle Lafleche

content: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
author: Maya Angelou

content: Sometimes you win, sometimes you learn.
author: John Maxwell

content: The harder you work, the luckier you get.
author: Gary Player

content: Do not stop thinking of life as an adventure.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

content: Act as if it were impossible to fail.
author: Dorothea Brande

content: Dreams don’t work unless you do.
author: John C. Maxwell

content: Don’t just wait for inspiration. Be the inspiration.
author: Unknown

content: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
author: Tim Ferriss

content: Believe in your infinite potential.
author: Unknown

content: Don’t stop until you’re proud.
author: Unknown

content: The best view comes after the hardest climb.
author: Unknown

content: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

content: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
author: Plutarch

content: The distance between dreams and reality is called action.
author: Unknown

content: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

content: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
author: Chris Grosser

content: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

content: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

content: Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.' Start where you stand.
author: Napoleon Hill
